Title: Relates to non-insurance benefits
Summary: Relates to authorizing non-insurance benefits or services to be offered as part of group life or group or blanket accident or health insurance policies.
LawCode: Add ยง3245, amd ยง4224, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to authorizing non-insurance benefits or services to be offered as part of a group life or group or blanket accident and health insurance policy
